block.p: TUNICK--Mildred. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Mildred Tunick, beloved mother of Andrew and Richard Tunick. The Tunick family has set a shining example of philanthropic leadership and generosity that strengthens our ability to serve those in need. We extend our deepest sympathies to Andrew and Richard, to Mildred's grandchildren, and to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.

TUNICK--Mildred. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Mildred Tunick, beloved mother of Andrew and Richard Tunick. The Tunick family has set a shining example of philanthropic leadership and generosity that strengthens our ability to serve those in need. We extend our deepest sympathies to Andrew and Richard, to Mildred's grandchildren, and to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.
